p: The results of the essential oil analysis of L. schaueriana are presented in Table 1, according to their retention indexes. The chromatogram of oil exhibited 21 peaks, which led to the identification of 19 components, representing 97.99% of the total oil composition. The main compounds found in the oil of leaves were piperitone oxide (51.25%), caryophyllene (17.76%), limonene (8.06%), spathulenol (6.63%), and piperitone (2.90%) ( Table 1).
